item.title: Building a CSS Dropdown Menu Without JavaScript
item.description: In the following example, we’ll illustrate how to construct a dropdown menu using CSS exclusively, without any JavaScript. This approach ensures that the dropdown retains its state when clicked. A key element of this demonstration is the :focus-within pseudo selector, which enables the dropdown to remain open even when its child links are clicked. Step 1: Setting up the Navigation Bar Begin by creating the basic structure of the navigation bar.
